alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Throckmorton County through 1015 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Us-183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line, or 15 miles north of the town of Throckmorton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton, Woodson, Elbert, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283 and Us-183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
